headline: Viatris Announces Launch of First Clozapine Orally Disintegrating Tablet (ODT) in Canada
summary: Viatris Inc. (Nasdaq: VTRS), a global healthcare company, today announced the launch in Canada of Gen-Clozapine orally disintegrating tablets (ODT) (12.5 mg, 25 mg, 50 mg, 100 mg and 200 mg), providing a new treatment option for treatment-resistant schizophrenia patients. This marks the first availability in Canada of an orally disintegrating tablet of clozapine, which is the only approved antipsychotic for treatment-resistant schizophrenia1.
